details.description:
Super sized 1 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
Big bedroom Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available May 1st Small pets accepted

Beautiful studio / 1 bath apartment in Williamsburg, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the JMZ trains
July 1st move in Small pets welcome

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. Could also be used a 1 bedroom plus home office. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat; Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
July 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains

Myspace Exclusive!
1 bedroom layout with extra office! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat; hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.

MySpace exclusive!
Spacious one bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Large living room perfect for entertaining. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere! Pies-n-Thighs, The Rosemont, Testo, Align Coffee, Williamsburg Pizza, Modern Love Vega, etc all nearby. Incredible Williamsburg location.
Available 7/1 Small pets OK Broker fee applies

New 1 bedroom!
Awesome location, right off the 2.3.5 trains!
Heat/Hot water included Separate Kitchen area Spacious Living room King Bedroom S/S appliances, Wood flooring Windows/Closets Live in Super
Available June 1! Small pets OK

Sunny 2 bed / 1 bath attached a now renovated 140yo church which has been converted into luxury apartments and sunday school
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops. Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Multiple laundry rooms Garage Parking ($250-300/mo) Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train. Pets ok No fee $20 app fee Call or text to view the right away.

2 Bed / 1bath with private balcony, in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Private balcony Bedrooms on opposite sides of the large living room Faces the back of the building away from any street noise Sunny 4th floor apartment Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to view the right away!

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!Beautiful apartment in Greenpoint, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, 1 queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, 1 modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from McCarren; McGolrick Parks, in addition to dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Keg; Lantern, Brooklyn Barge, TORST, Spritzenha, Northern Territory, Five Leaves, Enid's, Paulie Gee's, Sauvage, Milk; Roses, Calexico.mShort commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

amenities.other: A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Intercom system, Central A/C, Roof Access

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First; Security NO FEE

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Central A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Private Outdoor Space, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit

The perfect spot for a central Williamsburg vibe in a slightly quieter area! Don't worry though, that busy waterfront is only a short walk away :) Find all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. East Williamsburg is still an amazing, diverse, and community-centered neighborhood with great accessibility to almost any other Brooklyn area and a very easy commute to Manhattan. Conveniently located off the L, J. M, and G trains, as well as the B43, B46, B48, and B60 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat
BUILDING FEATURES: Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck

details.description: Introducing 581 Ocean, located in Kensington, alongside historical Ocean Parkway. 581 Ocean is a brand new luxury building offering 60 rental units.All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.Amenities include an elevator, lounge, gym, laundry room, bike storage, and parking garage.deally located on Ocean Parkway and 18th Avenue, you?ll have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue and Ditmas Avenue stations. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.Make sure to enjoy all the diverse culture and dining this neighborhood has to offer.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Hardwood Floors, Roof Access, Shared Outdoor Space

details.description: Gorgeous newly renovated 2 bed in Prospect Lefferts Garden! Breakfast bar in an open concept kitchen! Stainless appliances! Spacious living room! Close to the Winthrop 2/5 makes an easy commute to the city! Small pets welcome!! Private backyard

1 bedroom + basement duplex with private yard!
- private yard - washer/dryer in unit - central AC - dishwasher - 1.5 bath
Brand new development! Prime location - Classon G train! Also near Baron's American Restaurant, Singer's Bar, Rustik Tavern, Natural Blend Coffee, Fan Fan Doughnuts, etc
No fee Pets OK

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors, Backyard, Private Outdoor Space, Washer/Dryer In Unit
